content.question: Let <math alttext="f of x, equals, 5 times x to the fourth power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="g of x, equals, e raised to the 2 x power, plus x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. If <math alttext="h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is the function defined by <math alttext="h of x, equals, f of, open parenthesis, g of x, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, which of the following gives a correct expression for <math alttext="h prime of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="20 times, open parenthesis, g of x, close parenthesis, cubed, equals, 20 times, open parenthesis, e raised to the 2 x power, plus x, close parenthesis, cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>20</mn><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="20 times, open parenthesis, g prime of x, close parenthesis, cubed, equals, 20 times, open parenthesis, 2 times e raised to the 2 x power, plus 1, close parenthesis, cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>20</mn><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="20 times, open parenthesis, g of x, close parenthesis, cubed, times, g prime of x, equals, 20 times, open parenthesis, e raised to the 2 x power, plus x, close parenthesis, cubed, times, open parenthesis, 2 times e raised to the 2 x power, plus 1, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>20</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⋅</mo><msup><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⋅</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>

<math alttext="5 times, open parenthesis, g prime of x, close parenthesis, to the fourth power, equals, 5 times, open parenthesis, 2 times e raised to the 2 x power, plus 1, close parenthesis, to the fourth power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="20 times, open parenthesis, g of x, close parenthesis, cubed, times, g prime of x, equals, 20 times, open parenthesis, e raised to the 2 x power, plus x, close parenthesis, cubed, times, open parenthesis, 2 times e raised to the 2 x power, plus 1, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>20</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⋅</mo><msup><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⋅</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the classification of a given expression (e.g., Use the chain rule to find the derivative of a composite function).
